definitions: in a way that suggests being absorbed in thought

examples.text: he nodded thoughtfully as I finished speaking
he stared thoughtfully into the fire

shortDefinitions: in way that suggests being absorbed in thought

examples.text: thoughtfully designed lighting created a romantic atmosphere
choose your words carefully and thoughtfully

definitions: with consideration for the needs of other people

examples.text: Eric has thoughtfully provided copies of all the files
the government thoughtfully offered to foot part of the bill

shortDefinitions: with consideration for needs of other people
